perturbation.changed_text:
11.1	Term. This Agreement shall be effective as of January 1, 2012 (the “Effective Date”), provided, however, that, ARTICLE XII and
ARTICLE XIII shall not be effective until after the Closing. The initial term of this Agreement shall begin on the Effective Date and continue for
three (3) years, subject to the prior termination rights provided below. At the end of such initial term, and any renewed term, as applicable, this
Agreement may automatically renew for an additional one (1) year term, unless a party provides written notice to the other parties at least six (6)
months prior to the end of the

12

initial term. At any time during a renewed term, this Agreement may be terminated by any party, or the agreement may continue indefinitely, subject to further negotiations between all involved parties.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly stated that the agreement auto-renews, while another requires explicit agreement. The modified version removes the certainty by introducing "subject to further negotiations between all involved parties,", making it unclear when agreement applies.
